item.description:
Can earthworms, wine, toothbrushes and handbags really help save the world?
Find out at Down:2:Earth, an exposition of the latest environmentally responsible products and services, and an educational forum exploring sustainable living. Learn about alternatives in food, fashion, transportation, energy, home and garden that tread lightly on the earth. It?s all happening March 28-30, 2008 at the Hynes Convention Center in Boston.

Keynote speakers Bill McKibben and Frances Moore Lapp√© will illuminate and inspire.
Visit www.d2eboston.com for details on cooking demos, eco-chic fashion shows, and a list of workshops and exhibitors! Discounted tickets available on-line until March 26th.

http://www.d2eboston....
item.name: For your Green pleasure......
